title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 80.4 - Court of Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 80.4 - Court of Appeals

State Regulations

The Chief Administrator of the Courts shall
adopt classifications and allocations of positions for all nonjudicial officers
and employees of the Court of Appeals and revise them when necessary and
appropriate, and shall have no other and additional powers and duties with
respect to the administration of the Court of Appeals except as directed by the

Court of Appeals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
80.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
